com.almasb.fxgl.scene

Class FXGLScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.scene.FXGLScene
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FXGLMenu, GameScene

    public abstract class FXGLScene
extends Object
    Base class for all FXGL scenes.

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      protected javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty active
      If a scene is active it is being shown by the display.

      • setCursor

        public final void setCursor(String imageName,
                            javafx.geometry.Point2D hotspot)
        Sets global game cursor using given name to find the image cursor within assets/ui/cursors/. Hotspot is location of the pointer end on the image.
        Parameters:
        imageName - name of image file
        hotspot - hotspot location
